title: About

content: Welcome to the Lab! Here, I share my knowledge on penetration testing, web development, and AI research. Stay tuned for new projects and write-ups!
summary: Welcome to the Lab! Here, I share my knowledge on penetration testing, web development, and AI research. Stay tuned for new projects and write-ups!
title: Home

content: Professional Experience#Sep 2024 – Dec 2024Network System EngineerMetrodata Academy InternshipAssisted in deploying, troubleshooting, and configuring network security solutions, including Palo Alto Next-Generation Firewall, Cortex XDR, Exabeam SIEM, and F5 Load Balancer.Collaborated with 5+ clients during Proof of Concept (PoC) sessions, providing technical support and presenting solution designs.Gained experience in project documentation, User Acceptance Testing (UAT), and proposal creation for enterprise clients.Aug 2024 & Nov 2025Cybersecurity Training ParticipantSecurity Manpower Training (SMT)Participated twice in the National Cybersecurity Training Initiative organized by INKOR and NSHC.Completed intensive Capture the Flag (CTF) and hands-on cybersecurity modules covering network & web attacks, malware analysis, and reverse engineering.Selected for onsite advanced training in South Korea, which included malware analysis workshops, offensive security exercises, and company visits to cybersecurity firms.Education#2025Bachelor of Computer ScienceUniversitas Ciputra SurabayaGPA: 3.88 / 4.00Award: 50% ScholarshipRelevant Coursework: Machine Learning, AI, Cyber Security, Computer Networks, Software Engineering, OOP, Mobile Development, Website Development, Database.Feb 2024 – June 2024Student Exchange ProgramDongseo University, South KoreaMajor: Bachelor of Computer EngineeringGPA: 4.25 / 4.5Award: Fully-Funded GKS Scholarship (Korean Scholarship)Relevant Coursework: Data Science, AR & VR Programming, Korean Language, Web Server Programming.
